org.openimaj.math.model.fit

Class RANSAC.BestFitStoppingCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.math.model.fit.RANSAC.BestFitStoppingCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RANSAC.StoppingCondition
    Enclosing class:
    RANSAC<I,D,M extends EstimatableModel<I,D>>

    public static class RANSAC.BestFitStoppingCondition
extends Object
implements RANSAC.StoppingCondition
    Stopping condition that allows the RANSAC algorithm to run until all the iterations have been exhausted. The fitData method will return true if there are at least as many inliers as datapoints required to estimate the model, and the model will be the one from the iteration that had the most inliers.
